title: Chinna Magaraniye Lyrics Priyasakhi
stanzas:
Chinna magaraniye
magalaga vanthaai.
Siripal enthan nenjil
santhosham thanthaai.

Kai veesum jannal nila
nee vantha velai.
Valkai padhai engum
vara verpu malai.

Engal veedu gadikarathil
ellaa neramum inbam.
Eni unthan pinnal
unthan anbal engal
ulagam suttrum

Chinna magaraniye
magalaga vanthaai.
Siripal enthan nenjil
santhosham thanthaai.

Pennukena vazhkayile
ilakanam ullathamma.
Vittu tharum gunam irunthal
ilakiyam agum amma

Anai varukum ithayathile
asaigal irukum amma.
Asaigal than valkai endral
avasathaigal pirakkum amma.

Roja poovum neeyum ondre
ithalgal ingae ithyam enge

Chinna magaraniye
magalaga vanthaai.
Siripal enthan nenjil
santhosham thanthaai.

Un thayum kettale
vinmien vendum endru
Vinmeengal nan tharuven
vidiyalai theruvala.

Unjaluku kettale
vanavil vendum endru.
Vanavillai naan tharuven
vasanthathai tharuvala.

Un asaigalai orunalum
naan marukavum illai adi.
Un thayai naan oru nalum
ingu verukavum illai adi

Enthan thaye en mugam paru
Unthan thaikum nal vali kuru

Chinna magaraniye
magalaga vanthaai.
Siripal enthan nenjil
santhosham thanthaai.

Kai veesum jannal nila
nee vantha velai.
Valkai padhai engum
vara verpu malai.

Engal veedu gadikarathil
ellaa neramum inbam.
Eni unthan pinnal
unthan anbal engal
ulagam suttrum
